meanings.sent1: She is very opinioned about politics.
meanings.sent2: He is known for being quite opinioned on various topics.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat seemed opinioned about which toy to play with.
meanings.sent4: Her opinioned stance on the matter was as solid as a rock.
meanings.sent5: The opinioned old man never hesitated to share his thoughts.

meanings.definition: Having a particular viewpoint or perspective.
meanings.sent1: The artist's opinioned view of the landscape was evident in her painting.
meanings.sent2: He had an opinioned outlook on the situation.
meanings.sent3: The dog seemed opinioned about which route to take for the walk.
meanings.sent4: Her opinioned perspective on life was like looking through a unique lens.
meanings.sent5: The opinioned student always had a fresh take on the class discussions.
